title: Podu Podu Lyrics Pugazh Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Pugazh Podu Podu Song Lyrics
Singer(s): Vivek – Mervin, MC AK, MC Rude, Vivek Siva, Mervin Solomon & RJ Balaji

Hara hara mahaa thevaki
He people in the house
va da va da vaada ootla
irukum ellarkum vanakam.
Namma vivek mervin music la
RJ Balaji kooda serndhu
paadirkardhu Thupaaki podu
Ennaachi.. podey podey
Cricket vilayadinom.. podey podey
Nee dhane adicha.. podey podey
Ada chi naa illa..

Muyandru modhi paaru
Thaaru maaru life-u unaku.
Kanavugal kayyil sera
mottha vidhayum ulla iraku

Un manadhil urudhi vendum
vaazhkayil nee munne poga.
Thalai ganam koodave
koodathu adhuve unaku aapu dhan,

Panivu ondru podhum
naalai undhan paeyarai solla
Silenta odhungi nillu
neram unaku nerungi sera
Vaanam dhaan yellai
unaku thadaigal udaithu mela vaada.

Tune aagu tune aagu mottha vidhayum irakku da
Rock it Rock it rock it baby!

Aakashavaani ketta paadal
idam petra thiraipadam pughaz
Paaadree..

Podu podu adichu udaichu pattaya kelapu
Podu podu paththala paththala sound-u yethu
Podu Podu eguri varan odhungi nillu
Podu Podu

Sultaaney kaayum podhu
kuthiraiku yedhu gulob jaamun
Cycle la kaathumilla
suluku edukka soupum illa.

Reel vittu mangamma
voodu vaasal engamma
Joom mandhira kaali
un shoe la rendu goli
Sotta thala ezhumalai
yerikoyen kaalu mela
Ezhumalai nee oru sotta thalai.
Raju nahi raju nahi raajusundaram bhol..

Now enough of m non sense behaviour exhibition.
This is RJ Balaji signing off the
IGR Marar of Anderson Raghavan with their Thupaaki

Soodu koraiyala soundu mudiyala
Kanavellam nenavaaga maara pogudhu
Sun-u maaravilla sunday varavilla
sadu gudu sadu gudu vaazhai maarudhey
Ulagamey oru fantasy
Adhula vaazha therinjaa king-u nee
Solla mudiyadhey naalaiku
Ur nelamai can be like a Ambaani
Million money Million honey
Unna suthi parakum da
Naalu peru roundu katti
Azhika ozhika paarpaan da
Kavala venaam machi
Idhudhan naama time
Pughaz thedi varapogudhu
Lets start the game

Hey luck nambi neeyum
Unna suthi locku pottukaadhey
Loosa life ah vittu
Koodukulla waste ah maatikaadhey
Oh uzhaipu onnu dhaan da
Un padathai oda vaikum machaan
Hey sharpa vela senja
Story ippa sooper hittu dhaan da

Podu podu adichu udaichu pattaya kelapu
Podu podu paththala paththala sound-u yethu
Podu Podu eguri varan odhungi nillu
Podu Podu lets go one more time

Podu podu adichu udaichu pattaya kelapu
Podu podu paththala paththala sound-u yethu
Podu Podu eguri varan odhungi nillu
Podu Podu

Indha paadalil varum varigal anaithum
Nagaichuvaikaaga padhivu seiya pattavai mattumey
Adhayum meeri ungal manadhu pun pattirindhal
We are basically fundamentally extremely sorry..
